sentences.text: A political collaboration between Future Republic (RF) and Area Democratica was announced on 18 April 2024. Area Democratica nominated some of its representatives on the RF list as independent candidates for the election.

On 18 April, a coalition was formed between the Sammarinese Christian Democratic Party and the Reformist Alliance, known as Democracy and Freedom (San Marino)|Democracy and Freedom.
On 24 April an coalition of the Party of Socialists and Democrats, Libera San Marino and the Socialist Party (San Marino)|Socialist Party was launched.
